result.reason: Error 3334 indicates resource exhaustion, common in the 32-bit version. The current error message ('Try changing the RDP version') is misleading. A clearer message suggesting the 64-bit build or reduced connections will better guide users.
result.approach: Update the 'RdpError3334' string resource to explicitly suggest switching to the x64 version, disabling bitmap caching, or reducing concurrent connections.

attempts.raw_output:
To address the persistent reporting of RDP error 3334 (resource exhaustion), which is resolved by using the 64-bit version of mRemoteNG but has a misleading error message in the 32-bit version, I am proposing to update the error message text.

```json
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "Error 3334 indicates resource exhaustion, common in the 32-bit version. The current error message ('Try changing the RDP version') is misleading. A clearer message suggesting the 64-bit build or reduced connections will better guide users.",
"priority": "P3-enhancement",
"estimated_files": ["mRemoteNG/Language/Language.resx"],
"approach": "Update the 'RdpError3334' string resource to explicitly suggest switching to the x64 version, disabling bitmap caching, or reducing concurrent connections."
}
```
